bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I make honey for you all. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am very small.
🌻 I like to visit flowers.
🐝 I buzz when I fly.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. Children think I'm cute and often make wishes on me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am round and small.
🌱 You can find me in the garden.
🐞 My name has 'lady' in it.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry crumbs. I am small, but strong, and live underground. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I work very hard.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than myself.
🏠 I live in a colony.

bug.question: I have wings of many colors, I start as a caterpillar, and I like to sip nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am beautiful and fly around.
🌷 I love flowers.
🐛 I used to crawl on leaves.

bug.question: I jump very high and eat plants. I am green and have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often found in grassy areas.
🦗 I make a chirping sound.
🌿 I like to eat leaves.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs and lots of eyes. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I spin a trap.
🕷️ I am not an insect, but an arachnid.
👀 I have more eyes than you.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly at night. I have a light on my bottom to help me be seen. Who am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am a magical bug.
💡 My light helps me find friends.
🌙 You see me when it's dark.

bug.question: I drink blood and buzz in your ear. I can be very annoying, especially when you are trying to sleep. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I have a pointy nose.
😴 I bother you at night.
🔴 I leave an itchy bump.

bug.question: I am long and thin with many legs. I live in dark places and can move very quickly. Who am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have lots of legs!
🕳️ I prefer damp, dark places.
🏃 I can run very fast.

bug.question: I look like a twig, helping me hide from birds. I eat leaves and blend in with trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am very good at camouflage.
🌳 I like to hang out on branches.
🍃 I look like part of a tree.

ocean.question: I’m a big body of water with lots of creatures living in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water!
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales swim in me.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in the ocean and hides in a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have orange and white stripes.
🏠 I live in a plant-like animal.
🎬 You might have seen me in a movie.

ocean.question: I am a hard shell that you can find on the beach. Sometimes you can hear the ocean if you put me to your ear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be someone's home.
🌊 You can find me near the water.
🐌 A snail might have lived in me.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean. I sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the biggest animal on Earth.
🌊 I breathe air through a blowhole.
🎶 I make sounds to talk to my family.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squeeze into tiny spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change my color.
💪 I use my arms to grab food.

ocean.question: I have a long, pointy nose and swim in the ocean. People think I look like I have a horn. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a type of whale.
✨ My 'horn' is actually a long tooth.
❄️ I live in very cold waters.

ocean.question: I’m a very small, colorful creature that lives in coral reefs and eats algae. I am important for keeping the reef healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a small fish.
🌈 I can be many colors.
🌿 I help keep the coral clean.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with a flat body and eyes on the same side of my head. I lie on the bottom of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a fish.
👀 I have two eyes on one side.
🎨 I can camouflage myself.

ocean.question: I am a tiny animal that lives in colonies and builds a hard skeleton. Over time, many of us together create a reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I live with many others.
🧱 I build a hard structure around myself.
🐠 Fish like to live near my home.

ocean.question: I am a strong current that flows in the Atlantic Ocean, bringing warm water from the Gulf of Mexico to Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am like a river in the ocean.
🌡️ I help keep some places warm.
🗺️ I am named after a region near Florida.
